item.description:
Hi Fitness Crew -

It's officially fall and leaf peeping is in full bloom up North. So why not view the leaves up close and personal by way of ZIP LINING!!!

Alpine Adventures in Lincoln, NH (approximately 2 hours North) promises to have spactacular views of the Western White Mountains. Our ZIP LINING Adventure will take us through a course including 5 zip lines and 5 suspended walk bridges which should take about 2 1/2 hours to complete.

Don't be scared...... it'll be alot of fun!!! Little Kids even do it ;-)

We'll get a discount with a group over 8 so once I receive the RSVP list I'll forward all the details but:

October 13th, meet at 9:00 am
Will coordinate Car Pooling for those interested
Cost right now $89

We'll drive up, zip line, eat somewhere after and drive home. Please plan on a full day.

Come on..... I dare ya ;-)

Susan

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Zip Lining, Lincoln, NH - $89
